name: Cat Ball (honk-of-doom)
description:
Dogs have escaped in the maguffin factory and only you can save the last cat-egg from like being eaten and stuff. You and your sweet kicking skills are our last and only hope!!!

Keep the cat alive by getting it and yourself to the level goals

This is my firt game ever uploaded!! woo me! It was made for Ludem Dare 46 in 72 hours with the theme "Keep it Alive".

---

 CONTROLS:

Keyboard and mouse

-  move with A and D

- jump with left mouse

- when in slo-mo kick with right mouse. mouse direction is the direction it will go in

- hold kick to kick harder!

- restart level with R

Controller (xbox)

- move with left stick

- jump with A

- when in slo-mo kick with B.  left stick is the direction it will go in

- hold kick to kick harder!

- restasrt level with X

---

The Jam theme made me think of the soccor game keep alive (also called keepy ups) and of escort missions. But escorting people is dull. Kicking them is better!! So I smushed the two.

Its far from finished and full of bugs but I hope you have fun!

I used a bunch of art and sounds from people waaay more talented than me. If anyting catches your eye. Here is where you can find them:

- Level and Character art by 0x72

- Game pad art by lightUp

- Sound FX by OmegaPixelArt

- Music by DOS88

- Font by Void

- I was going to use this music pack from chiptunistchippy but ran out of time :(

THANKS FOR PLAYING. and also reading this!
